explains: v. 提醒，使想起；（因相像）使联想起（remind sb. of）
wordGroup: remind of 提醒；使记起；使回想起
that reminds me [用来转换话题]我想起来了

sentences.en: Remind me to phone Alan before I go out.
sentences.cn: 提醒我在出去之前给艾伦打电话。

sentences.en: Can you remind me to buy a bottle of wine?
sentences.cn: 你能提醒我买一瓶葡萄酒吗？

sentences.en: You remind me of your father when you say that.
sentences.cn: 你说这样的话，使我想起了你的父亲。
